_comment1: This sets PUBLIC_URL during the build
_comment2: fsevent@1.2.9 is locked in to prevent broken builds on windows for v1.2.11

scripts.msbuild: npm run clean && react-scripts build && cp-cli node_modules/tgstation-server-control-panel/build/public/ build/ && rimraf ../wwwroot && move-cli build ../wwwroot
